definition[0]: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other
example[0]: It is important to the success of any firm that its partners should be in complete accord.
example[1]: These results are in accord with earlier research.
definition[1]: a formal agreement between countries or groups
example[2]: the Helsinki accord on human rights
definition[2]: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment
example[3]: You will not be accorded any special treatment.
example[4]: Every school accords high priority to the quality of teaching.
